Bid the best

The whole event is a bidding event.

  • Round 1 Head rush a M.c.q based quiz round,where top 30 go to next round and selection will be on marks but they will also be awarded points 100 for write and -50 for worong answer which will be carried forward.
  • Round 2 A debate round and selection on last round point and presentation ,content,involvement in the round.
  • Round 3Random team will be formed.One partner will bid for the image,then he will have to describe the image to his partner within give time .Then his partner will be given to search the image and then to explain it to jury.

Satodhiyu(gujarati)

It is game where one person is allowed only 3 throws .One person stands behind the pyramid of stones.The pyramid is to be broken and the opposite team needs to hit the other player to make him out of game and vice versa.5 points for first try and -5 points if doesnt hit.
